entry.title: 13 Silver Sword - Siser Sparkle HTV
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Sparkle
Price: 2.60 - 14.00 (4 variants)

 

Transform plain items into glitzy treasures with Siser Sparkle!

This gleaming vinyl has a smooth but sparkly finish and it can be applied onto cotton/polyester and elastic fabrics. Sparkle is almost as thin as regular EasyWeed (125 microns compared to 90) but signifcantly thinner than the Glitter line which measures 325 microns. 

Available in 15 dazzling colors, including transparent and transparent glitter colors, all with adhesive backing. Excellent for multilayer application.

You can’t buy happiness but you can buy Sparkle and it’s kind of the same thing!
